descriptionHtml:
Tired of Buying Soul Gems?
If you found another Petty Soul Gem You will commit suicide?
You Want an Easy way to get some Soul Gems?

So this mod is for You!

Now with Nexus Smiting: Craftable and Smeltable Soul Gems you can craft your own soul gems!, That's Right!, you can Craft All Soul Gems using Ingots!

You can mine your ores smelt and craft soul gems!

You can Smelt a Small filled soul gem into a Bigger Empty Soul Gem!

You can smelt smaller soul gems and create Bigger Ones!

The Best of All is this is Not Cheat!, The Crafted soul gems are EMPTY! and the ingots to craft is the same value of the empty soul gems!

Also available on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=118718834
-------------------------------- Recipes --------------------------------

=========== CRAFTING ===========

1 Petty = 1 Steel Ingot
1 Lesser = 1 Corundrum Ingot
1 Common = 1 Quicksilver Ingot
1 Greater = 1 Gold Ingot
1 Grand = 2 Malachite Ingots
1 Black = 2 Ebony Ingots

=========== SMELTING: EMPTY ===========

1 Petty = 2 Soul Gem Fragments
1 Lesser = 2 Petty
1 Common = 2 Lesser
1 Greater = 2 Common
1 Grand = 2 Greater
1 Black = 1 Grand + 1 Malachite Ingot

=========== SMELTING: FILLED ===========

1 Lesser = 1 Petty Filled
1 Common = 1 Lesser Filled
1 Greater = 1 Common Filled
1 Grand = 1 Greater Filled
1 Black = 1 Grand filled
